import { Icon } from '@iconify/react/dist/iconify.js' import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from "react"; import { apiPost } from "../services/client"; const ForgotPasswordLayer = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const ForgotPassword = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const data = { email } const res = await apiPost('forgot', data); console.log('response',res); if (res?.data?.status == true) { console.log(res?.data) } else { console.log(res?.response?.data?.message); } } catch (error) { console.log(error); } finally { setLoading(false) } } return ( <>

Forgot Password

Enter the email address associated with your account and we will send you a link to reset your password.

setEmail(e.target.value)} />

Already have an account?{" "} Sign In

{/* Modal */}
Verify your Email

Thank you, check your email for instructions to reset your password

Don’t receive an email?{" "} Resend

) } export default ForgotPasswordLayer
